svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-03-03T09:01:50.078Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/110.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/110.0.1587.50" etag="SkV9v9-S0K-Mfm7Y1LzH" version="20.8.1" type="device"><diagram id="YdCVxZdaRRXoGMhNFGi5" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 100px; margin-left: 201px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 17px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: KAK & Perencanaan Proyek

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 100px; margin-left: 401px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 17px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Identifikasi Kebutuhan Bisnis

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 100px; margin-left: 601px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 17px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Identifikasi Kebutuhan Fungsional

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 100px; margin-left: 801px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 17px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Desain Aplikasi

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 100px; margin-left: 1001px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 17px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Konstruksi Aplikasi

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 150px; margin-left: 205px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
KAK:
- Kebutuhan fungsional, jaminan, dokumentasi keamanan aplikasi
- Desc. lingkungan Development, Testing, dan Production
- Syarat uji terima keamanan aplikasi

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 205px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Dok. Perencanaan:
- Tahapan Audit/Review/Uji Keamanan
- Bagian rencana pemenuhan kebutuhan/standar keamanan aplikasi memiliki SDM, waktu, anggaran yg cukup dan memadai

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 205px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Analis Keamanan TI:
- Ada pihak yg secara jelas ditunjuk sebagai Security Officer yang bertugas melakukan peninjauan dan audit atas pelaksanaan kegiatan

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 150px; margin-left: 405px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Business Requirement Specification (BRS):
- Wajib mencantumkan Persyaratan Keamanan aplikasi
- Application Role antar pengguna harus didefinisikan dengan jelas beserta Segregation fo Duty nya

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 405px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- Mendefinisikan sumber daya yg dibutuhkan untuk melaksanakan Standar Keamanan Aplikasi
- Menerapkan manajemen risiko untuk mengidentifikasikan ancaman, kemungkinan dan dampak penggunaan aplikasi

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 405px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Analis Keamanan TI:
- Melakukan Risk Analysis secara kualitatif dan mendokumentasikan ke Risk Register aplikasi untuk di tracking perubahannya

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 150px; margin-left: 605px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Functional Requirement Specification (FRS):
- Wajib ada bagian khusus Persyaratan Keamanan aplikasi
- Pembagian hak akses, fungsi antar menu berbasis peran harus didefinisikan/Segregation of Duty

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 605px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- Definisi sumber daya yg dibutuhkan untuk melaksanakan Standar Keamanan Aplikasi
- Manajemen risiko utk identifikasi ancaman, kemungkinan dan dampak penggunaan aplikasi dari sudut pandang teknis

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 605px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Analis Keamanan TI:
- Melakukan Risk Analysis dari sudut pandang teknis secara kualitatif dan mendokumentasikan ke Risk Register aplikasi untuk di tracking perubahannya

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 150px; margin-left: 805px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- Desain aplikasi wajib mengakomodasi Persyaratan Keamanan pada BRS dan FRS
- Wajib ditinjau unit IT Operation
- Desain Sistem Aplikasi harus memperhatikan ancaman" serangan yg mungkin terjadi

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 805px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Pengembang Aplikasi Internal/Rekanan:
- Design Architecture/System
- Data Flow Diagram (DFD)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 805px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Analis Keamanan TI:
- Threat Modeling
- Secure Design Review (SDR)
- Mengupdate Risk Register aplikasi sesuai hasil temuan terbaru di fase ini, begitu juga seterusnya di fase berikutnya

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 150px; margin-left: 1005px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- Harus mematuhi Persyaratan Keamanan yang telah ditentukan dalam dokumen desain aplikasi
- Hasil konstruksi harus ditinjau oleh fungsi audit utk memastikan pekerjaan telah sesuai persyaratan keamanan aplikasi

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 1005px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Pengembang Aplikasi Internal/Rekanan:
- Secure Coding
- Harus gunakan Standar Tools pemrograman yg telah disahkan dan divalidasi keamanannya

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 1005px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Analis Keamanan TI:
- Static Application Security Testing (SAST)
- Software Composition Analysis (SCA)
- Secure Code Review
- Mengupdate risk register

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 100px; margin-left: 1201px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 17px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Pengujian Aplikasi

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 150px; margin-left: 1205px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- Skenario ujicoba berisi Standar yang harus dipenuhi untuk setiap skenario
- Hasil ujicoba didokumentasikan dan ditindaklanjuti jika masih ditemukan ketidaksesuaian dgn standar yang telah ditentukan

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 1205px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Pengembang Aplikasi Internal/Rekanan:
- Harus buat skenario ujicoba khusus yg mengevaluasi Persyaratan Keamanan
- Dokumentasi & tindaklanjuti hasil temuan

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 1205px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Analis Keamanan TI:
- Dynamic Application Security Testing (DAST)
- VA/Penetration Testing (VAPT)
- Audit Keamanan Aplikasi
- Mendokumentasi hasil ujicoba, update risk register, tindaklanjuti

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 100px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 17px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Sosialisasi & Pelatihan Keamanan Aplikasi

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 150px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Pengembang Aplikasi Internal dan Rekanan:
- Pelatihan awal (onboarding) dan juga setiap sebelum melakukan pekerjaannya, WAJIB diberikan
- Pelatihan pengulangan berkala 1 tahun sekali

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Pengguna Aplikasi:
- Bukan hanya elatihan penggunaan aplikasi, namun juga mengenai keamanan aplikasi sebelum diberikan hak akses kepada aplikasi yang akan digunakan

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Analis Keamanan IT:
- Menyiapkan bentuk dan materi pelatihan wajib untuk pengembang dan pengguna aplikasi (secure coding, security awareness, sosialisasi kebijakan, dll)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 12px; margin-left: 700px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;

div.div: STANDAR Tahapan Secure Software Development Life Cycle (S-SDLC) berdasarkan Pedoman BSSN

switch.text: STANDAR Tahapan Secure Software Development Life Cycle (S-SDLC) berdasarkan Pedoman BSSN
